pathAssistantSteps.info: • ‘Closed’ indicates the list is no longer active or available for future distribution
• ‘Distribute’ indicates, the list is ready for distribution with the wider QUT team
• 'In Progress' indicates list member identification is in progress

• ‘New’ indicates that you have identified a new list with a specific criteria.
  • Complete the ‘List Summary’ section under the ‘Details’ tab by updating the data fields.
• ‘Qualification’ indicates, the identified list members are being qualified for final distribution
